body.p:
Clay County Kentucky
To his excellency the Govenor of the state of Ky
Dear Govenor

enclosed you will find a copy of the indictment against Jac Col. Jacob Giltner, together waith the petition of the county Judge of Clay county, asking for a reward by your excellency for the apprehension of said Col, Jacob Giltner. who so cruelly Murdered my Father. i hope you will consider the application for reward favorably

Respectfully your obt serv
A, H, Clark late Col.
47h Ky.
